page.title: 12REDBROOK SHOPS
page.content: The Peters and Hutchison families are joint partners in{Redbrook Stores.}Two people work in the shop at a time. There is a{Post Office}area within the shop.}Shop opening hours are from 8.30-1:00, 2.00-5.30, with{half-day {closing}on{Saturday.}The{Post Office opens at 9.00.{Customers}range from children to senior citizens. They sell groceries, greengrocery, gifts, off licence drinks and confectionery. Most of their customers buy single items of grocery in the shop, and, presumably, buy the rest in nearby super- markets. {The Cafe,}owned by{Mr. and Mrs. Crang, employs two part time workers. It opens 7.30-5.30 and sell sweets, ice- creams, cigarettes and snacks. Some chidren buy sweets there but most of their customers are adults.
